ARABIC: أَفَلَا يَتُوبُونَ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ وَيَسْتَغْفِرُونَهُۥ وَٱللَّهُ غَفُورٌ رَّحِيمٌ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Why do they not turn to Allah and ask for His forgiveness? Allah is Ever-Forgiving, Most Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Why do they not turn to God and ask His forgiveness? God is forgiving and kind.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Will they not, then, turn to Allah in repentance, and ask for His forgiveness? Allah is All-Forgiving, All-Compassionate.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Should they not repent and ask Him for forgiveness? God is All-forgiving and All-merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: So why do they not incline towards Allah and seek His forgiveness? And Allah is Oft Forgiving, Most Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Will they not repent to Allah and ask His forgiveness For Allah is Oft-Forgiving, Most Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Will they not then turn to Allah and ask His forgiveness? And Allah is Forgiving, Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Will they not turn to God and pray His forgiveness? God is All-forgiving, All-compassionate.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Will they not rather turn unto Allah and seek forgiveness of Him? For Allah is Forgiving, Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Why do they not turn to God and ask for His forgiveness? God is forgiving and merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Wherefore turn they not toward Allah and ask His forgiveness? And Allah is Forgiving, Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Will they not repent to Allah and plead to Him for forgiveness? Yet Allah is all-forgiving, all-merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Why turn they not to Allah, and seek His forgiveness? For Allah is Oft-forgiving, Most Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Will they not repent to Allah and ask His Forgiveness? For Allah is Oft-Forgiving, Most Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Will they not turn to Allah in repentance and ask His forgiveness? He is Forgiving, Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Will they not repent to God and ask His forgiveness? God is Forgiving and Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: So will they not repent to Allah and seek His forgiveness? And Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [5:74] Will they not turn in repentance to God and seek His forgiveness?, for what they say (the interrogative is intended as a rebuke); God is Forgiving, to the one who repents, Merciful, to him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Will they not rather turn unto Allah) repent of their claims (and seek forgiveness of Him?) by declaring His divine Oneness. (For Allah is Forgiving) of he who repents and believes, (Merciful) towards him who dies repentant.
